subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Craig Robinson, who is the brother-in-law of Barack Obama, is in his first season as Brown’s basketball coach and is overhauling a program that hasn’t been to the N.C.A.A. tournament since 1986.
snippet: Craig Robinson, who is the brother-in-law of Barack Obama, is in his first season as Brown’s basketball coach and is overhauling a program that hasn’t been to the N.C.A.A. tournament since 1986.
